com.epoch.session

Class AdminSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.UserSession
      • com.epoch.session.StudentSession
        • com.epoch.session.InstructorSession
          • com.epoch.session.AdminSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppConstants, UserConstants, AnySessionConstants

    public class AdminSession
extends InstructorSession
    Holds an administrator's session. AdminSession can access all the functions of InstructorSession, and StudentSession, but the call will be valid only after a call to setActedUser(). InvalidOpException is thrown otherwise. AdminSession can indirectly use all basic functions of the user session.

        private transient String selector
        Selector for finding particular students. Only those students are selected where their last name begins with sel.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
             throws DBException,
                    UniquenessException,
                    StudentNumConstraintException,
                    StudentEmailExistsException
        Adds a user to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - contains the new User information
        Throws:
        UniquenessException - when more than one user has this user's login ID
        StudentNumConstraintException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that student ID number
        StudentEmailExistsException - when another student has the same email address
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

        Throws:
        ParameterException - when userNum is out of bounds
        UniquenessException - when more than one user has this user's login ID
        StudentNumConstraintException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that student ID number
        StudentEmailExistsException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that email
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

        Remove from the database those students who haven't logged in recently.
        Parameters:
        y_m_d - String array of years, months, days; may represent a specific date or a time interval
        instnId - the ID of the institution, or all of them, whose inactive students are being removed
        Returns:
        list of two-string arrays containing name and email address of removed students
